ej,piera001,P,relic901,Fight at HP ej,andeb003,P,relic901,Fight at HP ej,barrm003,P,relic901,Fight at HP ej,mabrj001,P,relic901,Fight at HP $as Barrett waited for the throw, Pierzynski ran him over then nudged Barrett after the latter got up; Barrett punched Pierzynski on the jaw and both benches cleared; Barrett, Pierzynski, Anderson and Mabry ejected by Reliford
ej,guilo001,M,eddid901,Balls and strikes White Sox Manager Ozzie Guillen ejected by HP umpire Doug Eddings

$Kinsler swung and missed for strike 3 at a pitch which hit him in the right bicep. As written in rule 6.05(f), he is out. But the rule does not specify putout and in this case the ball rolled to the first baseman who made the play. Apparently (according to MLB and STATS game totals), the putout went to the catcher and there was no assist.
